thread.title: Not everyone’s happy about Adele’s big Grammys win… Beyoncé fans are FURIOUS their idol was snubbed
thread.title_full: Not everyone’s happy about Adele’s big Grammys win… Beyoncé fans are FURIOUS their idol was snubbed

author: lwindle
title: Not everyone’s happy about Adele’s big Grammys win… Beyoncé fans are FURIOUS their idol was snubbed
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments LAST NIGHT’S GRAMMYs were huge for singer Adele who snapped up the three biggest awards of the night. 
The British songstress went home with grammar phones for Album of the Year, Song of the Year and Record of the Year , becoming the first artist ever to score the ‘hat-trick’ twice. Reuters Adele won five awards in total at the GRAMMYs including Album of the Year, Song of the Year and Record of the Year 

In her acceptance speech for Album of the Year – awarded for ‘25’ – however, the Hello singer shocked fans when she announced she didn’t deserve it . 
She said: ““The ‘Lemonade’ album is monumental, so monumental, so well-thought-out, so beautiful and soul-baring.” 
It turns out she may not be the only one who feels that way. 
While Adele fans are delighted with the wins, Beyoncé’s legions of avid supporters are furious that their idol was snubbed for the coveted award . 2 A pregannt Beyonce performed at the awards ceremony last night 
One outraged tweeter said: “How can Beyoncé only win 1 award at the grammys and Adele beat her for Album of the year? Woman had over 9 nominations & better album.” 
Another twitter user weigh up the argument: “Beyonce album was better but you can’t ignore the fact that Adele album sold more in 1 week than Beyonces sold in the whole year.” How can Beyoncé only win 1 award at the grammys and Adele beat her for Album of the year? Woman had over 9 nominations & better album 🙄 
— Ife Oyetade (@ifeoyetade) February 13, 2017 Beyonce album was better but you can't ignore the fact that Adele album sold more in 1 week than Beyonces sold in the whole year
